attributes.additional_details: we call on the governmant to be fair on people who have had to give up work because of sickness..people that have been working for years have been suffering with all kinds of sickness ,bad backs etc..therefore whatever job they have been in they have struggled due to being ill..but the governmant are trying to force them back to work and discriminate them instead.we call for this to stop and the genuine people to be left alone .and to be able to have whatever time off they need to get well again!!..the dwp can clearly see they have been working!..the doctors are told by the governmant to cut back on helping people with sick notes.or told to only give them sick notes for ESA for a short amount of time .this is unfair and unjust!.as sick people need their own time to heal and get whatever help they need.and that cannot be done if they have to work!.
